title: Ep 210: How to Memorize Kolhberg's Stages of Moral Development
description: Need to memorize Lawrence Kohlberg's stages of moral development really quickly?  This is what you're looking for - a brief audio podcast in which I give you some crazy images that will stick in your mind for a really long time.  You'll be surprised at how quickly you'll have the six stages memorized.  Some of my listeners have actually said that the mnemonics have stuck in the stuck in their head for years!  Whether you are studying for a psychology test or a nursing exam, you will find this a fun and effective way to learn.  I challenge you to listen to this episode and then quiz yourself a few hours later.  You'll be pleasantly surprised.  Let's memorize!
